page.title: 09OUR FUTURE
page.content: A long time ago people found{coal}and oil. Now-a-days we rely heavily on these{fuels}and a few others. One day we are going to{run out,}not for a while but quite soon. Supplies will start to get less and will be a lot harder to find. We will not be able to cope with the demands because we are {burning thousands of tonnes a day.}All the time we are taking a part of the Earth and burning it and running cars, tractors and lorries. Soon all these fuels will be gone and people will say{"We shouldn't have used them {so fast".}If we want to keep this fuel and our Earth, we must cut down using them{NOW!} {Ryan Moon (11 yrs.)
